price: Zã Mu jẽfa tsõro a cikin zukãtan waɗanda suka kãfirta sabõda shirkin da suka yi da Allah gãme da abin da bai saukar da wani dalili ba game da shi. Kuma makõmarsu wuta ce, kuma tir da mazaunin azzãlumai!
arabic: سَنُلۡقِي فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلرُّعۡبَ بِمَآ أَشۡرَكُواْ بِٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِهِۦ سُلۡطَٰنٗاۖ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ وَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sanul'qī fī qulūbi alladhīna kafarū al-ruʿ'ba bimā ashrakū bil-lahi mā lam yunazzil bihi sul'ṭānan wamawāhumu al-nāru wabi'sa mathwā al-ẓālimīna
